title: Ummmmmmmm
body:
So I entered ARAM queue with a black screen and waited a bit and nothing happened so I restarted the client and I get a leavebuster? 
http://imgur.com/mDwn8bD

replies.body: restarting client is leaving so yea leave buster:P
I've had that happen to me recently too, very annoying. No need to run a client repair as it was a once off (to me that says Riot bug), but I cop the penalty. Thanks Rito.

Hey there,

This is a very odd occurrence that I haven't had happen to me personally however, some players are reporting that hitting your enter (return) key when this happens will resolve it, has this occurred since?

Could you also [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), just to ensure that nothing is corrupt.
